description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a caterpillar - move around the board, collect all of your coins, and return home to finish the level.  But you'll need to avoid obstacles and other caterpillars to earn a high score.
description.short: You are a caterpillar - move around the board, collect all of your coins, and return home to finish the level.  But you'll need to avoid obstacles and other caterpillars to earn a high score.
